Package com.drfl.twinstickshooter.view

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    TSSScoreboard.ScoreFunction
    Adapter pattern interface for getting the different values from a TSSScore object without having to explicitly write the getter methods.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    TSSGameOver
    Game over screen, displays for a set amount of time and changes to highscore or main menu screen depending on whether the player achieved an high score.
    TSSMainMenu
    Main menu screen, options for starting game, seeing highscores, controlling volume, choosing input method and exiting game.
    TSSMapSelect
    Map select screen, allows player to choose between 3 maps to play.
    TSSMenuHelper
    Singleton utility class for common menu functionalities.
    TSSScoreboard
    Scoreboard screen, shows top 10 high scores and allows inputting of high scores after a game.
    TSSView
    MVC View, handles displaying the graphics associated with the Model entities.
